hype: Insane trick you need to try.

cta_soft: Share with a friend who needs this.

kitchen.label: microwave lemon-steam
kitchen.benefit: No harsh chemicals — just citrus steam
beats: 0–3s · Dirty microwave close-up • clinical light
3–6s · Glass bowl + water + 3 lemon slices — center of turntable
6–9s · Door clicks • countdown • bowl spins
9–14s · Steam burst • single wipe = pristine wall
14–15s · Static gleam • tiny lens flare
kitchen.prompt_en:
(0-3s) Hyper-realistic 8K, 9:16. Cinematic tracking across a dirty microwave interior; clinical light reveals dried tomato splatters, grease, caked-on food. Background: modern minimalist American kitchen (white cabinets, marble countertop). 
(3-6s) Hands with light-pink manicure place a glass bowl with water + three lemon slices on the turntable center. Medium close. 
(6-9s) Door clicks shut. Exterior shot of sleek stainless-steel microwave; digital display counts down; interior light shows bowl spinning. Exactly 3s. 
(9-14s) Door opens; citrus-scented steam billows toward camera. A crisp white paper towel wipes once; grime vanishes revealing bright white wall; oddly satisfying. 
(14-15s) Final static of spotless interior; tiny lens flare. 
Overall: 9:16 vertical, 15s, bright minimalist, hyper-realistic 8K, airy studio lighting, sharp instructional cuts; mood: satisfying, effortless, magical cleaning hack.
kitchen.prompt_zh:
（0–3 秒）超寫實 8K，9:16。電影級推軌掃過骯髒微波爐內壁；臨床感燈光顯出乾掉番茄醬、油垢與結塊食物殘渣。背景為現代極簡美式廚房（白櫥櫃、大理石檯面）。
（3–6 秒）塗淡粉色指甲的手將「清水 + 三片檸檬」玻璃碗放在轉盤中央。中近景。
（6–9 秒）門輕扣關上；切到外觀；數位面板倒數；內燈照亮旋轉玻璃碗。恰 3 秒。
（9–14 秒）門一開，檸檬蒸氣撲向鏡頭；一張白紙巾單次擦拭，重污瞬間消失，露出潔白牆面，極度療癒。
（14–15 秒）最後定格：潔淨內壁與微弱鏡頭光暈。
整體：9:16 直式、15 秒，明亮極簡，高擬真 8K，通透棚燈，銳利教學剪輯；氛圍：療癒、輕鬆、如魔法般的清潔祕訣。

bathroom.label: bathroom mirror descaling
beats: 0–3s · Hard water spots on mirror • harsh light reveals scale
3–6s · Mix 1:1 vinegar & water in spray bottle • microfiber ready
6–9s · Mist glass evenly • dwell time 30–60s
9–14s · Single top-to-bottom wipe • streaks vanish • edge polish
14–15s · Crystal clear reflection • soft glint
bathroom.prompt_en:
(0-3s) 9:16, 8K macro of bathroom mirror covered with hard water spots, harsh overhead light highlighting scale.
(3-6s) Hand mixes 1:1 white vinegar and water in a clear spray bottle; microfiber cloth ready.
(6-9s) Even mist across glass; let sit 30–60s; close-up droplets breaking mineral film.
(9-14s) One slow top-to-bottom wipe; streaks vanish; corners polished with small circular motions; oddly satisfying.
(14-15s) Final static: crystal clear reflection with a soft glint. Bright minimalist aesthetic.
bathroom.prompt_zh:
（0–3 秒）9:16，8K 近拍浴室鏡面佈滿硬水斑；頂光強烈顯示水垢。
（3–6 秒）手將白醋與清水 1:1 混合於透明噴瓶；備妥超細纖維布。
（6–9 秒）均勻噴灑鏡面；靜置 30–60 秒；特寫顯示水滴分解礦物膜。
（9–14 秒）自上而下一次慢擦；條痕消失；邊角小圈拋光；療癒滿點。
（14–15 秒）最後定格：清澈倒影與柔和高光。明亮極簡風。

laundry.label: laundry vinegar softening
laundry.benefit: Softens fabric, neutralizes odors, no residue
beats: 0–3s · Pile of dull towels • muted light
3–6s · Add 1/2 cup white vinegar to fabric softener slot
6–9s · Machine starts • gentle swish • close-up bubbles
9–14s · Remove towels • fluff test • smell check smile
14–15s · Stack of bright, fluffy towels
laundry.prompt_en:
(0-3s) 9:16, 8K, stack of dull towels; flat light.
(3-6s) Close-up: pour 1/2 cup white vinegar (unscented) into softener compartment.
(6-9s) Start cycle; slow macro of water and detergent swirling.
(9-14s) Pull out towels; fluff test and satisfied inhale; visible brightness improvement.
(14-15s) Final static: neatly stacked fluffy towels. Minimalist, bright aesthetic.
laundry.prompt_zh:
（0–3 秒）9:16、8K；一疊黯淡毛巾；平光。
（3–6 秒）近拍：倒入 1/2 杯無香白醋於柔軟精槽。
（6–9 秒）啟動行程；微距拍攝水流與清潔劑旋動。
（9–14 秒）取出毛巾；蓬鬆測試與嗅聞滿足表情；亮度提升可見。
（14–15 秒）最後定格：整齊疊好的蓬鬆毛巾。極簡明亮風格。

car.label: car vent deodorize (baking soda)
car.benefit: Neutralizes odors at the source, quick fresh cabin
beats: 0–3s · POV car interior • stale-air vibe
3–6s · Access cabin filter area • small sachet of baking soda
6–9s · Sprinkle lightly / insert sachet near intake
9–14s · AC on recirculate • air particles animation • smile
14–15s · Clean, crisp interior shot
car.prompt_en:
(0-3s) 9:16, 8K, car interior feeling stale.
(3-6s) Open cabin filter access; show a small breathable sachet of baking soda.
(6-9s) Insert sachet near intake or lightly sprinkle (demonstration only).
(9-14s) AC on recirculate; visual cue of cleaner airflow; driver smiles.
(14-15s) Final static: fresh, tidy dashboard shot. Bright minimalist grade.
car.prompt_zh:
（0–3 秒）9:16、8K；車內陳舊氣味的氛圍感。
（3–6 秒）打開冷氣濾網位置；展示一小包可透氣的小蘇打粉包。
（6–9 秒）將小包置於進氣處附近或示範少量灑放（示意）。
（9–14 秒）開啟內循環；以視覺提示乾淨氣流；駕駛露出滿意表情。
（14–15 秒）最後定格：車內乾淨清爽的儀表台。明亮極簡色調。
